description:
Helps to visualize most frequent, slowest, failed queries.
Shows queries rate per second, table with last queries

targets.formattedQuery:
$rateColumns(
    substring(query,  1,  45) AS query,
    count() c)
FROM $table
WHERE
    cityHash64(query) global in (
    SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  45)) AS h
    FROM $table
    WHERE
        $timeFilter
        AND type in ($type)
        AND initial_user in ($user)
        AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
    GROUP BY h
    ORDER BY count() desc
    LIMIT $top)
    AND type in ($type)
    AND initial_user in ($user)
    AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.query:
SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM 
	(SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM 
		( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 60) * 60)*1000 AS t, substring(query, 1, 60) AS query, sum(written_bytes) c FROM
				grafana_monitor.query_log_all 
		  WHERE $timeFilter AND     cityHash64(query) global in (
				SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  60)) AS h     FROM 
						grafana_monitor.query_log_all   
				WHERE         $timeFilter         
					AND type in ($type)         
					AND initial_user in ($user)         
					AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))     
				GROUP BY h     ORDER BY sum(written_bytes) desc     LIMIT $top)
			AND type in ($type)     
			AND initial_user in ($user)     
			AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1)) 
		GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query
		) 
	GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
	)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM  	(SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM  		( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 60) * 60)*1000 AS t, substring(query, 1, 60) AS query, sum(written_bytes) c FROM 				grafana_monitor.query_log_all  		  WHERE event_date >= toDate(1584600670) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1584600670) AND     cityHash64(query) global in ( 				SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  60)) AS h     FROM  						grafana_monitor.query_log_all    				WHERE         event_date >= toDate(1584600670) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1584600670)          					AND type in (1,2,3,4)          					AND initial_user in ('default','qqmusic_search_user','','qqmusic_live_user','qqmusic_log_only_user')          					AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1))      				GROUP BY h     ORDER BY sum(written_bytes) desc     LIMIT 5) 			AND type in (1,2,3,4)      			AND initial_user in ('default','qqmusic_search_user','','qqmusic_live_user','qqmusic_log_only_user')      			AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1))  		GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query 		)  	GROUP BY t ORDER BY t 	)

panels.content:
1 - successful start of query execution

2 - successful end of query execution

3 - exception before start of query execution

4 - exception while query execution
panels.title: Types

	(SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM

				system.query_log 
		  WHERE $timeFilter AND     cityHash64(query) global in (
				SELECT cityHash64(substring(query,  1,  60)) AS h     FROM

					AND initial_user in ($user)

		GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query

targets.query:
SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM 
	(SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM 
		( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 5) * 5)*1000 AS t, query AS query, sum(memory_usage) c FROM
				grafana_monitor.query_log_all 
		  WHERE $timeFilter AND     cityHash64(query) global in (
				SELECT cityHash64(query) AS h     FROM 
						grafana_monitor.query_log_all   
				WHERE         $timeFilter         
					AND type in ($type)         
					AND initial_user in ($user)         
					AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))     
				GROUP BY h     ORDER BY sum(memory_usage) desc     LIMIT $top)
			AND type in ($type)     
			AND initial_user in ($user)     
			AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1)) 
		GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query
		) 
	GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
	)

    WHERE
        $timeFilter

targets.query:
SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM 
	(SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM 
		( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 1) * 1)*1000 AS t, query AS query, count(*) c FROM
				grafana_monitor.query_log_all 
		  WHERE $timeFilter AND     cityHash64(query) global in (
				SELECT cityHash64(query) AS h     FROM 
						grafana_monitor.query_log_all   
				WHERE         $timeFilter        
					AND type in ($type)         
					AND initial_user in ($user)         
					AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))     
				GROUP BY h     ORDER BY count(*) desc     LIMIT $top)
			AND type in ($type)     
			AND initial_user in ($user)     
			AND('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1)) 
		GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query
		) 
	GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
	)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT t, arrayMap(a -> (a.1, a.2/runningDifference( t/1000 )), groupArr) FROM  	(SELECT t, groupArray((query, c)) AS groupArr FROM  		( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 1) * 1)*1000 AS t, query AS query, count(*) c FROM 				grafana_monitor.query_log_all  		  WHERE event_date >= toDate(1584600670) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1584600670) AND     cityHash64(query) global in ( 				SELECT cityHash64(query) AS h     FROM  						grafana_monitor.query_log_all    				WHERE         event_date >= toDate(1584600670) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1584600670)         					AND type in (1,2,3,4)          					AND initial_user in ('default','qqmusic_search_user','','qqmusic_live_user','qqmusic_log_only_user')          					AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1))      				GROUP BY h     ORDER BY count(*) desc     LIMIT 5) 			AND type in (1,2,3,4)      			AND initial_user in ('default','qqmusic_search_user','','qqmusic_live_user','qqmusic_log_only_user')      			AND('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1))  		GROUP BY t, query ORDER BY t, query 		)  	GROUP BY t ORDER BY t 	)

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    rand() as t,
    substring(query,  1,  70) AS query,
    avg(query_duration_ms) duration,
    count() count
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
GROUP BY query
ORDER BY duration desc
LIMIT $top
targets.query:
select 
row_number,
row_info.1 name,
row_info.2 total_rows,
row_info.3 total_bytes
from
(select groupArray((name,total_rows,total_bytes)) as row_info_list,arrayEnumerate(row_info_list) as index_list from (
    SELECT
        concat(database,'.',table) name,
        sum(rows) total_rows,
        sum(bytes_on_disk) total_bytes
    FROM monitor.doge
    GROUP BY name
    ORDER BY total_rows desc ) t
) array join row_info_list as row_info,
index_list as row_number
LIMIT $top
targets.rawQuery: select  row_number, row_info.1 name, row_info.2 total_rows, row_info.3 total_bytes from (select groupArray((name,total_rows,total_bytes)) as row_info_list,arrayEnumerate(row_info_list) as index_list from (     SELECT         concat(database,'.',table) name,         sum(rows) total_rows,         sum(bytes_on_disk) total_bytes     FROM monitor.doge     GROUP BY name     ORDER BY total_rows desc ) t ) array join row_info_list as row_info, index_list as row_number LIMIT 5

targets.formattedQuery:
$rate(count() c)
FROM $table
where  type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.query:
$rate(count() c)
FROM $table
where  type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
targets.rawQuery: SELECT t, c/runningDifference(t/1000) cRate FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 10) * 10) * 1000 AS t, count() c FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date >= toDate(1577952012) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1577952012) AND  type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default','','qqmusic_search_user','qqmusic_log_only_user','qqmusic_live_user')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t)

panels.title: Reqs/s by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
    and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 10) * 10) * 1000 as t,     avg(query_duration_ms)  select_duration FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1577952012) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1577952012)     AND type = 2     and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'select') = 1     and initial_user in ('default','','qqmusic_search_user','qqmusic_log_only_user','qqmusic_live_user') GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND type = 2
and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1
    and initial_user in ($user)
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 10) * 10) * 1000 as t,     avg(query_duration_ms) insert_duration FROM system.query_log WHERE     event_date >= toDate(1577952012) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1577952012)     AND type = 2 and positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'insert into') = 1     and initial_user in ('default','','qqmusic_search_user','qqmusic_log_only_user','qqmusic_live_user') GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery:
SELECT
    event_time,
    user,
    query_duration_ms duration,
    memory_usage memory,
    if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,
    concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.query:
SELECT
    event_time,
    user,
    query_duration_ms duration,
    memory_usage memory,
    if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,
    concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
    AND type in ($type)
    and initial_user in ($user)
    and('$query_type' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  '$query_type') = 1))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     event_time,     user,     query_duration_ms duration,     memory_usage memory,     if(exception!='', 'fail', 'success') result,     concat(substring(query,1,120), '...') query FROM system.query_log WHERE event_date >= toDate(1498209895) AND event_time >= toDateTime(1498209895)     AND type in (1,2,3,4)     and initial_user in ('default')     and('all' = 'all' or(positionCaseInsensitive(query,  'all') = 1)) ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 1000

panels.title: Query log by type: $type; user: $user; query type: $query_type

list.label: initial user
list.name: user
list.query: select distinct initial_user from system.query_log where event_date >= today()-3 and event_time > toDateTime(today()-3)

title: ClickHouse Queries
